concept.title: Upgrade
concept.shortdesc: You can upgrade a previous version of to a new version. You can upgrade an installation from the tarball, an installation from the RPM package, or an installation with Cloudera Manager.

conbody.p: In some situations, you must complete pre and post upgrade tasks.
When an origin or destination system is upgraded to a new version, you must configure existing pipelines to work with the upgraded system.
